title: How to Record a Voice Note in Microsoft Teams A Quick and Powerful Way to Communicate | Microsoft Community Hub
text: Forum Discussion JohnNaguib Jul 24, 2025MVP How to Record a Voice Note in Microsoft Teams A Quick and Powerful Way to Communicate In today’s fast-paced work environment, clear and quick communication is critical. While chat messages and video calls are great, sometimes you just need a simple, human way to express your thoughts—enter voice notes in Microsoft Teams. Microsoft Teams now allows users to record and send voice notes directly in 1:1 and group chats, making communication more personal, fast, and expressive. Whether you’re on the move, multitasking, or just prefer speaking over typing, this feature is a game-changer.
